additional_info: w3.org, whatwg.org, kb.mozillazine.org :: Hover over an icon at the bottom right corner to see the page's ToC. developer.mozilla.org, api.jquery.com :: Left sidebar pops up when you hover over a thin blue vertical bar at the left side of the page. — 2014 09-30 +api.jquery.com 2014 05 08 w3c selectors4 2014-03-29 + kb.mozillazine.org 2013-10-31 + mdn.beonex.com 2013-10-07 ++ whatwg.org — 2016-03-30 W3C Working Draft 21 April 2015 —
